page.title: 12Living in Stanwell cont.
page.content:
Some people we talked to can remember when Stanwell was nearly all fields belonging to a family called Purser.
On the village green there is an old plane tree that used to have a bench around it. The tree grew too big so they had to take the seat away.
Kelly's great great Grandad was the village blacksmith and the forge was where the DIY shop is now.
A lot of our land around Stanwell has been used for gravel pits. That's because of all the motorway building. Lots more of the land has been used to build houses. The airport used up the most.
Stanwell is still a good place to live though. Sharan Kundi 8yrs
